content: the little tannenbaum ornament is a simple tree-shaped holiday decoration that is spruced up with little buttons these are super quick to knit up and are really cute decorative ornaments for the holiday season make indivudual trees as ornaments for a christmas tree or string several together into a pretty garland finished height of the ornament is approximately 4-5 10-12cm tall depending on how tightly you knit > share your projects on instagram with #littletannenbaumornament or @wee_ewe_knits i love to see your pics ♥️
